note: Real good-lookin' rural antifascist rosé grower posting from Dreadful Acres Farm in the Texas Hill Country. Blurry iPhone nature photos my specialty. Beard Award-nominated food writer (ret.), feminist blogger (ret.), rocker (ret.), bartender (ret.), atheist, home chef AF, TV liker, horse haver, goat herder, dog lover & appreciator of wild entities. Due to user error, I also have a Pomeranian. 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍⚧️🇺🇦 🖖🖖🏼🖖🏾🖖🏿 👩‍🦽
